## RouterOptions interface

Options to initialize a [Router](./reactivuety.router.md) instance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RouterOptions extends PathParserOptions 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [PathParserOptions](./reactivuety.pathparseroptions.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [history](./reactivuety.routeroptions.history.md) | RouterHistory | History implementation used by the router. Most web applications should use <code>createWebHistory</code> but it requires the server to be properly configured. You can also use a \_hash\_ based history with <code>createWebHashHistory</code> that does not require any configuration on the server but isn't handled at all by search engines and does poorly on SEO. |
|  [linkActiveClass?](./reactivuety.routeroptions.linkactiveclass.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Default class applied to active [RouterLink](./reactivuety.routerlink.md)<!-- -->. If none is provided, <code>router-link-active</code> will be applied. |
|  [linkExactActiveClass?](./reactivuety.routeroptions.linkexactactiveclass.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Default class applied to exact active [RouterLink](./reactivuety.routerlink.md)<!-- -->. If none is provided, <code>router-link-exact-active</code> will be applied. |
|  [parseQuery?](./reactivuety.routeroptions.parsequery.md) | typeof originalParseQuery | <i>(Optional)</i> Custom implementation to parse a query. See its counterpart, [RouterOptions.stringifyQuery](./reactivuety.routeroptions.stringifyquery.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [routes](./reactivuety.routeroptions.routes.md) | [RouteRecordRaw](./reactivuety.routerecordraw.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Initial list of routes that should be added to the router. |
|  [scrollBehavior?](./reactivuety.routeroptions.scrollbehavior.md) | [RouterScrollBehavior](./reactivuety.routerscrollbehavior.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Function to control scrolling when navigating between pages. Can return a Promise to delay scrolling. Check . |
|  [stringifyQuery?](./reactivuety.routeroptions.stringifyquery.md) | typeof originalStringifyQuery | <i>(Optional)</i> Custom implementation to stringify a query object. Should not prepend a leading <code>?</code>. [parseQuery](./reactivuety.routeroptions.parsequery.md) counterpart to handle query parsing. |
